title: "American" copperplate-style connected script
content:
Im clueless on this one. Thanks in advance.

| --- | --- |
| [Picture 8.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000852/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%208_4.png) | 9.58 KB |

 [‹ (x) Native Sun logo condensed didone - Poster Bodoni Comp {Naoise Ó Conchubhair}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47997 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Park Community Church logo - custom designed (based on Bell Gothic) {Naoise Ó Conchubhair} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47976 "Go to next forum topic")
author: one8e

comments.content: I don’t know it either, but [Young Baroque](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000852/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/young_baroque_std_plain/?sample_text=american&sample_size=144) or [Anglia Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000852/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/psyops/anglia_script_concise_ot/?sample_text=american&sample_size=96) are a step above.
Bickley Script Std is also somewhat similar.
